plot: An ambitious attorney turned songwriter becomes engulfed in the underworld of the music business, compromising his career and questionable marriage.
plot_en: An ambitious attorney turned songwriter becomes engulfed in the underworld of the music business, compromising his career and questionable marriage.
plot_es: An ambitious attorney turned songwriter becomes engulfed in the underworld of the music business, compromising his career and questionable marriage.
title: Guy Theory
